headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On The Diamond Casino Podium: The Pegassi Torero
content:
Stop by The Diamond Casino & Resort to spin the Lucky Wheel and win GTA$, RP, clothes, accessories, and all manner of mystery prizes to line your pockets. This week’s top prize a-whirling on the podium is the collector’s dream: the Pegassi Torero, a retro sports car that still feels like it could transport you five minutes into the future.

Discover the Lucky Wheel in The Diamond Casino & Resort lobby. If you win the top prize, your Podium Vehicle will be delivered to your selected Garage.
